long_description: Shelter your gear from splashes and rain with the Seattle Sports Hydralight duffel. Built tough with ripstop nylon and radio frequency welded seams, the Seattle Sports Hydralight duffel provides waterproof protection up to the zipper. Coated zipper and storm flap offer added weather resistance. Seattle Sports Hydralight duffel features an exterior, splash-resistant pocket and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Although this item is made with a weather-resistant zipper, materials and seams, it is not intended for immersion and not fully waterproof.
short_description: Shelter your gear from splashes and rain with the Seattle Sports Hydralight duffel.
